title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. V, pt. 221 - COMMODITIES
content:

§ 221.1 - Packaging and labeling regulation; application
§ 221.2 - Definitions
§ 221.3 - Declaration of identity
§ 221.4 - Declaration of responsibility
§ 221.5 - Declaration of quantity; consumer packages
§ 221.6 - Prominence and placement; consumer packages
§ 221.7 - Declaration of quantity; nonconsumer packages
§ 221.8 - Requirements-specific consumer commodities, packages, containers
§ 221.9 - Exemptions
§ 221.10 - Packaging variations to be allowed
§ 221.11 - Test procedures, magnitude of permitted variations
§ 221.12 - Method of sale of commodities; general
§ 221.13 - Method of sale of specific commodities
§ 221.14 - Net contents of containers to be indicated on the outside thereof
§ 221.15 - Sales slips
§ 221.16 - Coin-operated devices
§ 221.17 - Repealed
§ 221.18 to 221.35 - Repealed
§ 221.40 - Repealed
§ 221.45 to 221.225 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. V, pt. 221

Statutory authority: Agriculture and Markets Law, §§16, 18, 46-a, 50k, 71-a, 179, 189, 255

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
